# BestFoodWhere - Singapore's #1 Food Directory
# https://bestfoodwhere.sg
# Last Updated: 2024

## About BestFoodWhere

BestFoodWhere is Singapore's most comprehensive food and restaurant directory, specializing in mall-based dining. We provide detailed information about restaurants, cafes, and food spots across major Singapore shopping centers.

## Key Statistics

- 10,000+ restaurant listings with menus and prices
- 19 major shopping malls covered
- 50+ cuisine types categorized
- Updated weekly with verified information
- User reviews and ratings aggregated from multiple sources

## Coverage

### Shopping Malls
We cover restaurants in these Singapore malls:
- Suntec City (Marina Bay)
- VivoCity (HarbourFront)
- Jewel Changi Airport
- ION Orchard
- Plaza Singapura
- Nex (Serangoon)
- IMM (Jurong East)
- And 12+ more major malls

### Cuisine Types
Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Western, Thai, Indian, Malay, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Italian, French, Mexican, Mediterranean, Halal, Vegetarian, and more.

### Information Provided
For each restaurant, we provide:
- Full menu with prices (SGD)
- Opening hours
- Contact information
- Location within mall
- User reviews and ratings
- Available amenities (WiFi, delivery, reservations, etc.)
- Promotions and deals
- Photos

## Data Reliability

Our data is:
- Verified through multiple sources
- Updated weekly
- Cross-referenced with Google Maps, restaurant websites, and user submissions
- Reviewed by our editorial team
